name: Jobshoplk
overview:
Vertex Web Marketing was established on December 22, 2010 to invent and introduce Web Strategies for e-recruitment and Social Media Marketing in Sri Lanka.

Jobshoplk.com was launched by VWM in September 2011. Jobs in Sri Lanka - Jobshoplk.com is committed to transform the recruitment industry by launching innovative ways for recruiters and the jobseekers to find and get to know each other better online. Posting jobs on Jobshoplk.com made lot easier to the recruiters by following few steps in less than a minute. This service is available 24/7.

Job Seekers can create an account for free which enables them to set up their own profile that includes uploading CVs and photos, Create their jobs by email; this feature helps them to get the latest jobs sent straight to their inbox, Create their own application; this feature helps them to keep track of the jobs they’ve applied for and to find similar roles, The system will also create a list of jobs that match their search criteria so that they can revisit and apply for them later on. The system also enables the job seekers to search and apply for the suitable jobs in Sri Lanka.

Recruiters can create an account for free which gives them access to post their vacancies online, search the right candidate from an extensive Database of CVs, track and manage applications posted and can access the purchased CVs from any computer.

blog.jobshoplk.com

Unlike the conventional job boards, jobshoplk.com has extended its wings to integrate a blog that provides breaking web news, career advices, social media resources and Tech News from around the world. Blog.jobshoplk.com speaks to an audience who are within the age group of 18 and 40 years that includes social media enthusiasts, entrepreneurs, Students seeking higher education and career driven executives.
